name: ALISGRAM
summary: The Cartonero Cabinet, made from recycled school cartons, stores small items like keys, cosmetics, and phones. This functional project promotes sustainable consumption and production patterns, aligning with SDG 12 and fostering eco-friendly practices in our school community.

name: Meta Labs
